Dear Gordan,
Dear Mohammed,

Further to my email over the weekend, please let us know if there is anything you require from our side in preparation for the installation of the Glas Italia showcases, digital screen, and the bracket for the Anish Kapoor artwork.

Could you also kindly confirm whether the reinforcement works for the wall supports of these elements will begin this week?

chunks.text:
Further to my email over the weekend, please let us know if there is anything you require from our side in preparation for the installation of the Glas Italia showcases, digital screen, and the bracket for the Anish Kapoor artwork.

Could you also kindly confirm whether the reinforcement works for the wall supports of these elements will begin this week?

As support for the Glas Italia installation, we will be assisting with bringing the boxes up from the basement to the ground floor this Thursday, with the help of our appointed handlers. We will also open the boxes to verify the contents. If it would be useful, perhaps you could be present when we open the crates so you may review the brackets, assess the weights, and cross-check any technical requirements?

Additionally, based on the correspondence from Lissoni’s team in November, I’ve compiled a brief installation guide from my research (attached). I hope this will support your preparation, and I trust that once the boxes are open, the installation details will become clearer.

The most important consideration at this stage is ensuring the walls are adequately reinforced to accommodate the individual weight-bearing loads of each showcase. 

Please don’t hesitate to reach out should you need anything further from me.

With gratitude,
Linton

	*	Lemi Spa
	*	Maletti Spa Furniture
	*	TechnoGym Equipment

	
	@Gordon | Stonehaven <mailto:Gordon@stonehaven.ae>  

	@Mohamed Hussain <mailto:m.hussain@finasi.ae>

	Important Note:

Following Ingie’s approval on Saturday, please can we proceed with the installation setup and required weightbearing preparations for the below Library wall elements:

	*	Digital Art Screens
	*	Glass Italia panels
	*	Anish Kapoor artwork (bracket only)

	Important Note:

	With the Baccarat chandelier installation scheduled to begin on 15th July, it is ideal that all dusty works on the Ground Floor be completed before this date. Once the chandelier is in place, the area should remain dust-free, as it is an intricate crystal piece and needs to be kept free from construction dust.

	 

	Styling Activities This Week:

	Tuesday 8th July

	*	Receive Baccarat Chandelier Delivery

	Thursday 10th July

	*	Unpack & place furniture: Ground Floor Family Room
	*	Unpack & place furniture: 1st Floor Family Area
	*	Unpack & place spa furniture: Lemi Spa & Maletti

	Friday 11th July

	*	Install TechnoGym Equipment – Gym
	*	Unpack & place furniture: IC’s Studio

	Thank you as always for your kind support. I remain at your disposal for any comments or queries — feel free to call me anytime on 050 551 6621.

	With gratitude,
	Linton

Dear Gordan,
Dear Mohammed,

Further to my email over the weekend, please let us know if there is anything you require from our side in preparation for the installation of the Glas Italia showcases, digital screen, and the bracket for the Anish Kapoor artwork – As a contractor, we should receive Engineering Instruction (EI) from STN & KCE as this is an additional work for FINASI.

chunks.text:
Further to my email over the weekend, please let us know if there is anything you require from our side in preparation for the installation of the Glas Italia showcases, digital screen, and the bracket for the Anish Kapoor artwork – As a contractor, we should receive Engineering Instruction (EI) from STN & KCE as this is an additional work for FINASI.

Could you also kindly confirm whether the reinforcement works for the wall supports of these elements will begin this week? – Please share all the catalogues of digital screen and Anish Kapoor Art. Please be informed before commencing the reinforcement work, we should cut the double layer gypsum as per the required sizes for Glass italia elements. However, this gypsum cutting work can be started after the issuance of EI.

As support for the Glas Italia installation, we will be assisting with bringing the boxes up from the basement to the ground floor this Thursday, with the help of our appointed handlers. We will also open the boxes to verify the contents. If it would be useful, perhaps you could be present when we open the crates so you may review the brackets, assess the weights, and cross-check any technical requirements? -Our Engineer, SAJO is full time at site and if required, I will be available with our subcon team. Kindly confirm the time.

chunks.text:
As support for the Glas Italia installation, we will be assisting with bringing the boxes up from the basement to the ground floor this Thursday, with the help of our appointed handlers. We will also open the boxes to verify the contents. If it would be useful, perhaps you could be present when we open the crates so you may review the brackets, assess the weights, and cross-check any technical requirements? -Our Engineer, SAJO is full time at site and if required, I will be available with our subcon team. Kindly confirm the time.

Additionally, based on the correspondence from Lissoni’s team in November, I’ve compiled a brief installation guide from my research (attached). I hope this will support your preparation, and I trust that once the boxes are open, the installation details will become clearer – Yes, we will go through the installation guide carefully and will come back to you if we have any questions.

The most important consideration at this stage is ensuring the walls are adequately reinforced to accommodate the individual weight-bearing loads of each showcase – We will do design calculation for the structural reinforcement and submit for review and approval before commencing the work.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out should you need anything further from me.

With gratitude,
Linton

chunks.text:
Thank you for your kind response and continued support. And apologies for leapfrogging into these points, we are eager to move into the styling phase of the ground floor area of the residence.

 

Please find my replies to the key points below:

 

Engineering Instruction for FINASI
We will await the Engineering Instruction (EI) to be issued by STN & KCE for the additional scope of work assigned to FINASI. They should already have all the necessary technical information to proceed. Perhaps this can be included as a discussion point in Tuesday’s coordination meeting to ensure alignment.

 

Anish Kapoor Artwork
Attached are the hanging details for the Anish Kapoor piece. We are arranging for the sculpture to be delivered to site this week. Upon arrival, we will open the crate on-site so that the Sajo can examine the support bracket that will be used for its installation.

 

Digital Screen

STN should have the relevant details to share. If not, we will request the necessary documentation for your reference.




Glas Italia Showcases

We will liaise with the Sajo for this item. We plan to move the showcases from the basement to the Library on Thursday morning at 9:30 AM. At that time, we will open the boxes so Sajo may review the brackets and internal fixings ahead of installation.

metadata.doc_id: C12D2KC - installation planning week of 7th–18th july\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
We will liaise with the Sajo for this item. We plan to move the showcases from the basement to the Library on Thursday morning at 9:30 AM. At that time, we will open the boxes so Sajo may review the brackets and internal fixings ahead of installation.




We fully understand that reinforcement work for all these elements will require cutting into the double-layer gypsum walls, which is why we are stressing the urgency—our aim is to complete all dust-generating works before the Baccarat chandelier is installed.  And to have the works complete for the Italian wall treatment team to complete the finishing.

 

Baccarat Chandelier
Could you kindly confirm whether the ceiling support structure will be completed and closed in time for the Baccarat team to proceed with the chandelier installation scheduled for Monday, 14th July?

 

Thank you once again for your kind assistance. 

With gratitude,

Linton

	Dear Gordan,
	Dear Mohammed,

	Further to my email over the weekend, please let us know if there is anything you require from our side in preparation for the installation of the Glas Italia showcases, digital screen, and the bracket for the Anish Kapoor artwork – As a contractor, we should receive Engineering Instruction (EI) from STN & KCE as this is an additional work for FINASI.

chunks.text:
Further to my email over the weekend, please let us know if there is anything you require from our side in preparation for the installation of the Glas Italia showcases, digital screen, and the bracket for the Anish Kapoor artwork – As a contractor, we should receive Engineering Instruction (EI) from STN & KCE as this is an additional work for FINASI.

	Could you also kindly confirm whether the reinforcement works for the wall supports of these elements will begin this week? – Please share all the catalogues of digital screen and Anish Kapoor Art. Please be informed before commencing the reinforcement work, we should cut the double layer gypsum as per the required sizes for Glass italia elements. However, this gypsum cutting work can be started after the issuance of EI.

	As support for the Glas Italia installation, we will be assisting with bringing the boxes up from the basement to the ground floor this Thursday, with the help of our appointed handlers. We will also open the boxes to verify the contents. If it would be useful, perhaps you could be present when we open the crates so you may review the brackets, assess the weights, and cross-check any technical requirements? -Our Engineer, SAJO is full time at site and if required, I will be available with our subcon team. Kindly confirm the time.

chunks.text:
As support for the Glas Italia installation, we will be assisting with bringing the boxes up from the basement to the ground floor this Thursday, with the help of our appointed handlers. We will also open the boxes to verify the contents. If it would be useful, perhaps you could be present when we open the crates so you may review the brackets, assess the weights, and cross-check any technical requirements? -Our Engineer, SAJO is full time at site and if required, I will be available with our subcon team. Kindly confirm the time.

	Additionally, based on the correspondence from Lissoni’s team in November, I’ve compiled a brief installation guide from my research (attached). I hope this will support your preparation, and I trust that once the boxes are open, the installation details will become clearer – Yes, we will go through the installation guide carefully and will come back to you if we have any questions.

	The most important consideration at this stage is ensuring the walls are adequately reinforced to accommodate the individual weight-bearing loads of each showcase – We will do design calculation for the structural reinforcement and submit for review and approval before commencing the work.

	Please don’t hesitate to reach out should you need anything further from me.

	With gratitude,
	Linton

Following Ingie’s approval on Saturday, please can we proceed with the installation setup and required weightbearing preparations for the below Library wall elements:

		*	Digital Art Screens
		*	Glass Italia panels
		*	Anish Kapoor artwork (bracket only)

		Important Note:

		With the Baccarat chandelier installation scheduled to begin on 15th July, it is ideal that all dusty works on the Ground Floor be completed before this date. Once the chandelier is in place, the area should remain dust-free, as it is an intricate crystal piece and needs to be kept free from construction dust.

		 

		Styling Activities This Week:

		Tuesday 8th July

		*	Receive Baccarat Chandelier Delivery

		Thursday 10th July

		*	Unpack & place furniture: Ground Floor Family Room
		*	Unpack & place furniture: 1st Floor Family Area
		*	Unpack & place spa furniture: Lemi Spa & Maletti

		Friday 11th July

		*	Install TechnoGym Equipment – Gym
		*	Unpack & place furniture: IC’s Studio

		Thank you as always for your kind support. I remain at your disposal for any comments or queries — feel free to call me anytime on 050 551 6621.

		With gratitude,
		Linton

Subject: Re: Installation Planning | Week of 7th–18th July

 

Dear Mohamed,

 

Thank you for your kind response and continued support. And apologies for leapfrogging into these points, we are eager to move into the styling phase of the ground floor area of the residence.

 

Please find my replies to the key points below:

 

Engineering Instruction for FINASI
We will await the Engineering Instruction (EI) to be issued by STN & KCE for the additional scope of work assigned to FINASI. They should already have all the necessary technical information to proceed. Perhaps this can be included as a discussion point in Tuesday’s coordination meeting to ensure alignment.

chunks.text:
Engineering Instruction for FINASI
We will await the Engineering Instruction (EI) to be issued by STN & KCE for the additional scope of work assigned to FINASI. They should already have all the necessary technical information to proceed. Perhaps this can be included as a discussion point in Tuesday’s coordination meeting to ensure alignment.

 

Anish Kapoor Artwork
Attached are the hanging details for the Anish Kapoor piece. We are arranging for the sculpture to be delivered to site this week. Upon arrival, we will open the crate on-site so that the Sajo can examine the support bracket that will be used for its installation.

 

Digital Screen

STN should have the relevant details to share. If not, we will request the necessary documentation for your reference.

 

Glas Italia Showcases

We will liaise with the Sajo for this item. We plan to move the showcases from the basement to the Library on Thursday morning at 9:30 AM. At that time, we will open the boxes so Sajo may review the brackets and internal fixings ahead of installation.

 

We fully understand that reinforcement work for all these elements will require cutting into the double-layer gypsum walls, which is why we are stressing the urgency—our aim is to complete all dust-generating works before the Baccarat chandelier is installed.  And to have the works complete for the Italian wall treatment team to complete the finishing.

chunks.text:
We fully understand that reinforcement work for all these elements will require cutting into the double-layer gypsum walls, which is why we are stressing the urgency—our aim is to complete all dust-generating works before the Baccarat chandelier is installed.  And to have the works complete for the Italian wall treatment team to complete the finishing.

 

Baccarat Chandelier
Could you kindly confirm whether the ceiling support structure will be completed and closed in time for the Baccarat team to proceed with the chandelier installation scheduled for Monday, 14th July? – We have delivered the metal reinforcements today to site and the team will complete the installation tomorrow. @Sajo Chacko <mailto:s.chacko@finasi.ae>  – Please share the images after the completion of the installation.

 

Thank you once again for your kind assistance. 

With gratitude,

Linton
